resources.string: Restart the application and try again.\nIf the error persists reinstall the application.
You\'re connected to the Freenet network.
Freenet makes intensive use of network data. With this option enabled Freenet will run only when connected to Wifi.\n\nThe node must be restarted to activate this setting.
Freenet may cause the battery to discharge quickly. With this option enabled Freenet will run only when charging.\n\nThe node must be restarted to activate this setting.
Access Freenet running on your phone from a PC or Tablet. The device must be on the same network. Access it through: http://%1$s:%2$d.

Version

v%1$s

Open source application built around Freenet Project.
